clinical_study.brief_title: Compliance and Usability Study Evaluating RHINIX™ Nasal Filters
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label Outpatient In-season Study Assessing Compliance and Usability of Rhinix™ Nasal Filters

brief_summary.textblock: This study will investigate usability and compliance related to rhinix nasal filters for the treatment of seasonal allergic rhinitis (hay fever) during the natural grass pollen season in Denmark.

primary_outcome.measure: Week 1 likelihood of continued use of RHINIX after study end.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 assessment at the end of the 1st week of use.
primary_outcome.description: In week 1: The proportion of subjects that rate that they will definitely or are likely to continue using RHINIX after the study is over given that they have stated that they have tried the device.

primary_outcome.measure: Week 2 likelihood of continued use of RHINIX after study end.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 assessment at the end of the 2nd week of use.
primary_outcome.description: In week 2: The proportion of subjects that rate that they will definitely or are likely to continue using RHINIX after the study is over given that they have stated that they have tried the device.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 assessment at the end of the 1st week
secondary_outcome.description: In week 1: The proportion of subjects who are completely or somewhat satisfied with RHINIX given that they have used the product.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: One assessment at the end of the 2nd week
secondary_outcome.description: In week 2: The proportion of subjects who are completely or somewhat satisfied with RHINIX given that they have used the product.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: One assessment at the end of the 1st week of use
secondary_outcome.description: In week 1: The proportion of subjects who state that RHINIX has helped "to a very high degree" or "to a high degree" in controlling their hay fever symptoms given that they have used the product

secondary_outcome.time_frame: One assessment at the end of the 2nd week of use.
secondary_outcome.description: In week 2: The proportion of subjects who state that RHINIX has helped "to a very high degree" or "to a high degree" in controlling their hay fever symptoms given that they have used the product

other_outcome.measure: Week 1: Correlation of use and allergy severiy
other_outcome.time_frame: One assessment at the end of the 1st week of use
other_outcome.description: In week 1: To assess the correlation between symptom severity at screening and likelihood of answering that they will definitely/likely continue using the product.

other_outcome.measure: Week 2: Correlation between use and allergy severity
other_outcome.time_frame: One assessment at the end of the 2nd week of use
other_outcome.description: Week 2: To assess the correlation between symptom severity at screening and likelihood of answering that they will definitely/likely continue using the product.

other_outcome.time_frame: One assessment after the 1st week of use
other_outcome.description: In week 1: To assess whether use of RHINIX has led to a perceived decrease in use of medication.

other_outcome.time_frame: One assessment after 2nd week of use
other_outcome.description: Week 2: To assess whether use of RHINIX has led to a perceived decrease in use of medication.

arm_group.description: All included will receive rhinix nasal filters

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Motivated to try a different treatment approach to seasonal allergic rhinitis (documented by answering the call-out by Astma-Allergi Danmark)
- Indicates having seasonal allergic rhinitis to grass via online questionnaire
- Informed consent (by email acceptance after having received information on the trial)
- Assess to internet and email
Exclusion Criteria:
- Improper fit of the Rhinix™ device
